Welcome to this place! ;)

I am **Joaquín Martínez-Minaya**, I obtained a **bachelor’s degree in mathematics** and a **master's degree in Biostatistics** at the University of Valencia (UV). I went on completing a **PhD thesis entitled Recent statistical advances and applications of species distribution modeling** in the Department of Statistics at the same University. From September 2019 till September 2021, I was a Severo Ochoa **postdoc researcher** at the Basque Center for Applied Mathematics (BCAM) in the Applied Statistics Research Line. From September 2021, I am **Assistant Professor** at the Department of Applied Statistics and Operation Research, and Quality at the Universitat Politècnica de València.
